name: @sergdudko/objectstream
description: Creates a stream to convert json from string or convert json to string.

scripts.testv10: docker run --name=objectstream-node10 --rm -v $PWD:/app node10:1.0.0 nyc npm run test
scripts.testv12: docker run --name=objectstream-node12 --rm -v $PWD:/app node12:1.0.0 nyc npm run test
scripts.testv13: docker run --name=objectstream-node13 --rm -v $PWD:/app node13:1.0.0 nyc npm run test
scripts.testv14: docker run --name=objectstream-node14 --rm -v $PWD:/app node14:1.0.0 nyc npm run test

author: Siarhei Dudko
